roleset.name: to loosen, wear away
roleset.note: FRAY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'fray' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from fray.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: [Its relationship with parent General Electric Co.]-1 had been frayed [*-1]since a big Kidder insider-trading scandal two years ago .
example.arg: since a big Kidder insider-trading scandal two years ago

example.name: intransitive
example.text: But the build-up of S& P futures sell orders weighed on the market , and [the link with stocks]-1 began [*-1] to fray again .
